title: Glamping Getaway in the Heart of South Australia’s Wine Region
description: Stay amid 200 acres of virgin bush and near South Australia’s popular wine region at the Coonawarra Bush Holiday Park. This natural gem offers everything from bushwalking to wine tours and quad biking. Included in your getaway is a return shuttle to a local walking wine trail, a bottle of wine on arrival and a leisurely late midday check-out.
